attributes.action: make it so you need some sort of permission/license before you are allowed to have children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before anyone in this country should have children they should all have to undergo an assessment before they are even allowed to concieve.I know it seems wrong as its such a natural thing but i think there is far too many children falling to the hands of violence that I see it as the only option to prevent it.In time it would bring the number of children in care down.
